StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetCandidateProgramCriteriaWaiver]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CandidateWaiverID int AS
SELECT CPCW.WAIVER_ID AS WaiverID, WC.WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE AS WaiverCategoryCode, WT.WAIVER_TYPE_CODE AS WaiverTypeCode, WL.WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE AS WaiverLevelCode FROM CANDIDATE_PROGRAM_CRITERIA_WAIVER CPCW INNER JOIN WAIVER W ON (CPCW.WAIVER_ID = W.WAIVER_ID AND CPCW.CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID = @CandidateWaiverID) INNER JOIN WAIVER_CATEGORY WC ON W.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = WC.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID INNER JOIN WAIVER_TYPE WT ON W.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = WT.WAIVER_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN WAIVER_LEVEL WL ON W.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID = WL.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID ORDER BY WC.WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE, WT.WAIVER_TYPE_CODE, WL.WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE, CPCW.WAIVER_ID
